ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dex and procing
ygData.msgSnippet: It seemed to jump on the sixes and ones like agility. (101, 106, 111, etc.) ... From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@moneystar.com] Sent: Wednesday, August 09,
ygData.messageBody:
It seemed to jump on the sixes and ones like agility. (101, 106, 111, etc.)

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 1:45 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] dex and procing


> 100 seemed to be the magic number, but.
>
> Doing some extensive testing at Dex's between 85 and 143 I
> found that procs
> occurred about twice as often at 100 as at 85. It doubled
> again at or near
> 132 in my tests and not much change thereafter. ymmv.

Thanks! one question, was it linear or did it just suddenly double?

If it suddenly doubles then that suggests I should get my agi up to 100 only
by replacing the BP neclace with something that has 5 agi and some AC. Okee
doke, thanks!

Tszaaz
